publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4427 Mrs Mary Mulligan: Congratulations to Auchinleck Talbot—That the Parliament congratulates Auchinleck Talbot on winning the OVD Scottish Junior Cup Final 2006; also encourages Bathgate Thistle as the runners-up who contributed to an excellent match, and believes that junior football has a strong role to play in encouraging the young people in our smaller Scottish towns to be physically active and involved in the local community.
S2M-4427 Congratulations to Auchinleck Talbot (lodged on 22 May 2006) Mr Adam Ingram*

S2M-4427 Mrs Mary Mulligan: Congratulations to Auchinleck Talbot—That the Parliament congratulates Auchinleck Talbot on winning the OVD Scottish Junior Cup Final 2006; also encourages Bathgate Thistle as the runners-up who contributed to an excellent match, and believes that junior football has a strong role to play in encouraging the young people in our smaller Scottish towns to be physically active and involved in the local community. Supported by: Mr Adam Ingram, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4427 Congratulations to Auchinleck Talbot (lodged on 22 May 2006) Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-4427 Congratulations to Auchinleck Talbot (lodged on 22 May 2006) Murray Tosh*
